trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Beavercreek
There were no other sightings in Beavercreek on or around November 22nd 2012
divs: Sighting Details1. Friend and I were stargazing outside a party. 2. Friend saw first. 3. Initially thought that it was Rigel, but it blinked and changed color. Also, Rigel was nearby by our vision, and the object was somewhat brighter than the star. 4. Reasoned that it was not a helicopter or an airplane as it was too high for the former and too stationary for the latter. 5. Reasoned that it was not a satellite as it moved randomly. 6. Object appeared to change direction randomly and blinked red and white lights. 7. Felt thrilled at the possibility of seeing something controlled by external intelligent beings. 8. Object remained relatively stationary. 9. Another similar object seen in the horizon.
Summary: Saw light near Rigel blinking red and white.
